title: Install an Avionics Suite
description: An avionics technician needs to install and connect all the components of an avionics suite in an aircraft cockpit.

tasks.description: Install all line-replaceable units (LRUs) such as flight displays and computers into the cockpit instrument panel racks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent physically installs all hardware components.

tasks.description: Connect all the wiring harnesses between the LRUs according to the installation drawings.
Power up the system and perform a built-in test (BIT) to ensure all components are communicating correctly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the BIT and confirms there are no fault codes.
